thread.section_title: David Sklar & Associates Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of David Sklar & Associates Inc. | davidsklar.com
thread.title: Russell G.
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Russell G.

author: Russell G.
title: Russell G.
text: Last December 2016, I found myself backed into a corner financially. I was in so much debt with credit cards... it was insane! I was making my payments on time for years, but couldn't get out of debt. I had heard of David Sklar and Associates Inc. through a television ad. I decided to call them up for help.. it was one of the best decisions I've ever made! The advisor who helped me was professional, non judgemental, and compassionate. I was informed on some choices and felt relieved after having made a decision to go with bankruptcy. I strongly suggest you call up this company for a no commitment appointment. You'll be glad you did it... I sure was! :-)
